attributes.action: Make National Service compulsory for convicted Young Offenders, instead of sending them to prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Convicted Young Offenders should be sent for National Service instead of sending them to prison. This would cut down on persistent reoffending, give them a purpose and possibly a career,  discipline them, hopefully make this current yob culture a thing of the past and in this way they would really be paying their debt to society. In turn this would stop future over-crowding of our prisons and stop such a waste of tax payer's money.

government_responses.details:
